text: Aayiram Meni is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by I. V. Sasi, starring Manoj K. Jayan and Urvashi in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Urvashi as Alice * Manoj K. Jayan as Babu * Divya Unni as Mallika * Lalu Alex as Varkey * Mala Aravindan as Sankaran *Captain Raju as Unnithan *Maathu as Lakshmi *Ashokan as Damu *Ganesh Kumar as Lalichan *Jagadish as Abdutty *Sadiq as Keshavan *Rajan P. Dev as Bhaskaran *Augustine as Naanu *Jose Pellissery as Kuriachan *Saikumar as Bharathan *Bheeman Raghu as Maramadi Mamachan *Chandni Shaju as Lilly * Biyon as Appu *Mini Nair as Varkey's wife *Tony as Murali *KPAC Ramachandran as Velichappad *Gayathri as Appu's mother *Sidha Raj as Police Officer ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by I. V. Sasi
title: Aayiram Meni
